targets.query: SELECT ${tcp_metric:raw} FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_application_port" WHERE "cstor_name" =~ /^$cstor_name$/ AND "network_monitor_name" =~ /^$network_monitor$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "cstor_name", "network_monitor_name", "application_port" fill(none)

SELECT ${tcp_metric:raw} FROM "tcp_timeslice_4_tuple" 
 WHERE ("cstor_name" =~ /^$cstor_name$/ AND ( ("client_ip" =~ /$ipa/ AND "server_ip" =~ /$ipb/) OR ("server_ip" =~ /$ipa/ AND "client_ip" =~ /$ipb/))) AND ("server_ip" !~ /$singleton_ips/ AND "client_ip" !~ /$singleton_ips/ ${singleton_filter:raw} true) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),  "application_port", "client_ip", "server_ip" fill(none)

SELECT ${tcp_metric:raw} FROM "tcp_open_4_tuple" 
 WHERE ("cstor_name" =~ /^$cstor_name$/ AND ( ("client_ip" =~ /$ipa/ AND "server_ip" =~ /$ipb/) OR ("server_ip" =~ /$ipa/ AND "client_ip" =~ /$ipb/))) AND ("server_ip" !~ /$singleton_ips/ AND "client_ip" !~ /$singleton_ips/ ${singleton_filter:raw} true) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval),  "application_port",  "client_ip", "server_ip" fill(none)

SELECT ${tcp_ts_metric:raw}  FROM "tcp_timeslice_4_tuple" 
 WHERE ("cstor_name" =~ /^$cstor_name$/   AND (("client_ip" =~ /$ipa/ AND "server_ip" =~ /$ipb/) OR ("server_ip" =~ /$ipa/ AND "client_ip" =~ /$ipb/))) AND ("server_ip" !~ /$singleton_ips/ AND "client_ip" !~ /$singleton_ips/ ${singleton_filter:raw} true) AND $timeFilter 
 GROUP BY  "client_ip", "application_port", "server_ip", "server_port", "vlan_tag_outer", "vlan_tag_inner", "client_${ip_info}", "server_${ip_info}"  fill(none)

SELECT ${tcp_open_metric:raw}  FROM "tcp_open_4_tuple" 
 WHERE ("cstor_name" =~ /^$cstor_name$/   AND ( ("client_ip" =~ /$ipa/ AND "server_ip" =~ /$ipb/) OR ("server_ip" =~ /$ipa/ AND "client_ip" =~ /$ipb/))) AND ("server_ip" !~ /$singleton_ips/ AND "client_ip" !~ /$singleton_ips/ ${singleton_filter:raw} true) AND $timeFilter 
 GROUP BY  "client_ip", "application_port", "server_ip", "server_port", "vlan_tag_outer", "vlan_tag_inner", "client_${ip_info}", "server_${ip_info}" fill(none)

variable.label: cStor
variable.name: cstor_name
variable.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "tcp_timeslice_summary_application_port" WITH KEY = "cstor_name"
